abstract: Judging by Facebook’s short-interest levels, a good number of investors seem to be betting that the social network’s shares will struggle for some time.
snippet: Judging by Facebook’s short-interest levels, a good number of investors seem to be betting that the social network’s shares will struggle for some time.
lead_paragraph: Judging by Facebook‘s short-interest levels, a good number of investors seem to be betting that the social network’s shares will struggle for some time.

headline.main: Amid Drumbeat of Bad News, Investors Bet Against Facebook

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
